text.div:
This code system http://fhir.cqgc.ferlab.bio/CodeSystem/fmh-relationship-plus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
MATMEM Maternal MemberThis value is indicated if the position of the member in the maternal branch is unknown
PATMEM Paternal MemberThis value is indicated if the position of the member in the paternal branch is unknown

Additional Language Displays

CodeFrench (fr)
MATMEMMembre de la branche maternelle
PATMEMMembre de la branche paternelle

name: fmh-relationship-plus
title: FMH relationship-plus
description: The added values ​​(specific to our systems) which extend the CodeSystem provided by HL7

concept.definition: This value is indicated if the position of the member in the maternal branch is unknown
This value is indicated if the position of the member in the paternal branch is unknown
